@John459 wrote:

Search for

/* OBJECT CLICK TWO*/

and put this under it:

case 2561: TheifStall("cake stall", "you got a cake", 1, 50 * playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 5, 0x340);

item.title: Simple problem
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Well my problem is nothing complicated, but it’s fustrating as I cant seem to figure out the problem.

I added a working theiving method for my server

if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("Cake stall", "you got a cake", 1, 50*playerLevel[17], 1891, 5, 0x340); }

Also i correctly spawned it,

makeGlobalObject(3079, 3252, 2561, 10);, 0

The problem is when I click on the stall nothing happens. I’m pretty sure that it’s because I didn’t add it under “second click objects” but I cant find second click objects anywhere in my client file.

If anyone could help, will be much appreciated.

EDIT : I can find “Second click NPC’s” but still not objects

Read full topic
